article: the international committee of the red cross -lrb- icrc -rrb- said friday it would airlift emergency relief supplies to earthquake-ravaged pakistan from its warehouse in the kenyan capital , its largest in the world .
abstract: icrc to airlift emergency aid from kenya to pakistani quake victims
